features.name: auth_attempts
features.doc: The number of authentication attemps we observed. There’s always at least one, since some servers might support no authentication at all. It’s important to note that not all of these are failures, since some servers require two-factor auth (e.g. password AND pubkey)

features.name: dsthost
features.doc: The responder’s hostname (reverse dns of IP address).

features.name: kex_alg
features.doc: The key exchange algorithm in use

features.name: srchost
features.doc: The originator’s hostname (reverse dns of IP address).

features.name: timestamp
features.doc: Time when the SSH connection began.
